issue.body:

issue.title: prilojenietelegraphmessenger.ru
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [http://prilojenietelegraphmessenger.ru](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fprilojenietelegraphmessenger.ru) ### Comment > Раньше вместо рекламы было пустое место, а теперь реклама то есть, то нет. Началось после одного из обновлений Telegraph Messenger. А пиратку с вырезанной рекламой нагло удаляет Play защита даже в выключенном состоянии. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/kphszaynm2o0c0gwck40ook800wkkscod477hyufo0.jpg?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Android v4.5 System version: | Hyperos 1.0.9 Browser: | Приложение Telegraph License type: | paid AdGuard mode: | VPN HTTPS filtering: | enabled Stealth mode options: | Strip URLs from tracking parameters,
Hide your search queries,
Send Do-Not-Track header,
Hide your Referrer from third-parties,
Hide your User-Agent,
Self-destructing third-party cookies,
Disable cache for third-party requests,
Block trackers DNS filtering: | disabled Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base,
AdGuard Mobile Ads,
EasyList

Privacy:

Peter Lowe's Blocklist Userscripts: | disabled
